segments.text: All right . I want to bring everybody back on this subject . When can we start working on this ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we could probably get started with a preparatory meeting this afternoon at 2:00 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I tell you what , 2:00 is not available for me , but you can get started and I'll come by at around 3:00
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's fine with me . How much time are we going to have to work on this ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Perhaps one year , I'm not sure .
segments.speaker: S1
